title: Love in it's [sic] extasie, or, The large prerogative a kind of royall pastorall / written long since by a gentleman student at Aeton and now published.
author: Peaps, William.
publisher: Printed by W. Wilson for Mercy Meighen, Gabriell Bedell, and Thomas Collins and are to be sold at their shop ...,
notes: Written by William Peaps.  Cf. Wing.
